ğŸ¦· Time to pay a visit to a dentist! Everyone is ready for theirs, except Elliot who has to face a big worry and go to the dentist cabinet! ğŸ˜¬ But are all those spooky stories heâ€™s heard about green teeth and alligators true? Or is his imagination running wild? Join this episode of "Stories for Kids" to discover that sometimes our biggest fears turn out to be not so scary after all. With help from his friends, Elliot learns that visiting the dentist is a lot easier (and more fun!) than he thought.
ğŸŒŸ This episode is perfect for little ones who might feel nervous about going to the dentist â€“ and it shows how facing your fears can lead to a bright, healthy smile! ğŸ˜
Episode Transcript
ğŸ›‘ If you want to send us an audio message about your kid's superpower, please include:
A short introduction (name, age, etc.)
What's your superpower or
What superpower would you like to have and why
It's important you read the terms before you send us the recording. Make sure to send it to podcast@lingokids.com by 8 of November.
â˜€ï¸ Parents, Inside the Lingokids app, we have 1,600+ fun, interactive activities, games, songs, and videos to help kids learn academics and modern life skills in todayâ€™s world. Itâ€™s free to try.
Story by L.X Mitev. Voices: Robin Reed. Music and Sound Design: Juan Delgado.
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
